amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the terms of contracts between shippers and ocean carriers be disclosed to the public and would have transferred the remaining functions of the Federal Maritime Commission to the Surface Transportation Board within the Department of Transportation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the terms of contracts between shippers and ocean carriers be made public. The amendment would transfer all functions of the Federal Maritime Commission to the Surface Transportation Board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 224 (Roll no. 143).
